dataIdInfo.idAbs: This dataset represents the Human Footprint Inventory Enhanced (HFIe) for the Oil Sands Monitoring Region (OSM). The HFIeOSM 2018 maps human footprint features across the entire OSM region. The dataset is intended to aid human footprint and land use inquiries.
dataIdInfo.idPurp: This dataset represents the Human Footprint Inventory Enhanced (HFIe) for the Oil Sands Monitoring Region (OSM). The HFIeOSM 2018 maps human footprint features across the entire OSM region. The dataset is intended to aid human footprint and land use inquiries.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Alberta Environment and Parks, Government of Alberta; This dataset includes data collected and created by the Alberta Human Footprint Monitoring Program and the Alberta Biodiversity Monitoring Institute.

cntAddress.delPoint: CW 405 Biological Sciences, University of Alberta

themeKeys.keyword: human footprint, seismic lines, cutlines, low impact, pre low impact, trail, energy

dataExt.exDesc: This dataset comprises visually interpreted human footprint in Alberta in 2018

dataLineage.statement: The HFI2018 was built using open sourced, proprietary, and historical data as a baseline. Research was conducted to identify new or previously uncaptured features, and these were added to the 2018 Layer.
